EstablishmentCollection.RightToReply:
<p>
	We took over the business in January 2024 and our inspection took place within 6 weeks of opening.&nbsp; Although we had things in place at that time, we had not got round to filling in the Safer Food Better Business and diary pack,&nbsp; We were however following the advice it contains. &nbsp;Since our inspection we have gone through the safer food better business pack to make sure it covers everything we do, and we are completing the diary pack daily.</p>
